text:
You have now finished the Derivatives and Alternative Investments topic sections. To
get immediate feedback on how effective your study has been for this material, log in to
your Schweser online account and take the self-test for these topic areas. The number
of questions on this test is equal to the number of questions for the topics on one-half
of the actual Level I CFA exam. Questions are more exam-like than typical Concept
Checkers or QBank questions; a score of less than 70% indicates that your study likely
needs improvement. These tests are timed and allow 1.5 minutes per question.
